content.question: The Column of Trajan was built mainly for the purpose of

choices.label: commemorating Trajan’s victories in recent military campaigns
marking the entrance to the Trajan markets to make them easy to locate
serving as a military lookout tower on the edge of the city of Rome
providing a platform for town criers for important news and announcements

content.answer: commemorating Trajan’s victories in recent military campaigns

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
